terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: Before using the dream analysis app, it is important to us that you understand the nature of the service:
terms.points.experientialOnly: The service is experiential and creative only, and does not constitute therapeutic, medical or psychological advice.
terms.points.localStorageOnly: Dreams are saved only on your device (in the browser), and are not saved on our server.
terms.points.noGuarantee: We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness or specific result of the interpretation.
terms.points.userResponsibility: Use of the app is the sole responsibility of the user.
terms.consentNote: By clicking "I accept the Terms of Use" you acknowledge that you have read and understood the terms, and agree to continue using the application.
terms.buttons.accept: I agree to the terms of use.
noConsent.title: The service cannot be provided without agreeing to the Terms of Use
noConsent.intro: Without agreeing to the Terms of Use, we cannot offer the dream analysis service, including dream storage and interpretation using artificial intelligence.
noConsent.readMore: However, you are welcome to continue browsing the site, and read explanatory material on different methods of dream analysis:
noConsent.backToTerms: At any stage, you can go back and agree to the terms of use to open the full application.
categoryStep.chooseCategory: In what approach would you like to interpret the dream?
categoryStep.chooseMethod: Choose a method for interpreting your dream:
interpretationCategories.psychological.s: Analyzing the dream through mental processes, the unconscious and personality patterns.
interpretationCategories.psychological.m: Interpreting the dream as revealing wishes and repressed material.
Focusing on archetypes, collective symbols and the individuation process.
interpretationCategories.spiritual.label: Spiritual
interpretationCategories.spiritual.short: Seeing the dream as a spiritual or energetic message.
interpretationCategories.spiritual.metho: Interpreting the dream using Kabbalistic or mystical symbols.
An open, intuitive reading of the dream without a fixed method.
interpretationCategories.scientific.shor: Interpretation based on neuroscience, memory research and cognitive psychology.
interpretationCategories.scientific.meth: Dreams as brain activity that the mind organizes into a narrative.
Dreams as part of learning, sorting and integrating memories.
Dreams as simulations to prepare the mind for danger.
Dreams help process and regulate emotional content.
interpretationCategories.experiential.sh: Continuation of experiences, tensions and emotions from daily life.
